message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that can greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than $10000. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. It's a fair price considering its value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11250. Can you consider that?
